name: Life Forge - Reborn ORPG
description: Life Forge is a Free 2D Online RPG. Take part in this sprawling adventure as you explore a massive world, gather resources to craft gear, engage in PvE and PvP, and buddy up with your friends to conquer end-game bosses!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 125mb DirectX: Version 8.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 8.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
